City Council

Government
  • Government
  • Agendas and Minutes
  • City Council
  • City Ordinances
  • Mayor's Office
  • Resourceskeyboard_arrow_right
    • Elections
    • Government Transparency
    • Public Information Requests
  • Staff Directory
City Council meetings are held at 6:00 pm on the second Monday of each month at the Troy Community Center located at 201 East Main Street. All meetings are open to the public.

The Troy City Council consists of 6 members, all of which are elected at large every two years.

 

View Agendas and Minutes
